name: The 18th Int'l Conference on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing (WiCOM 2024)
content: The 18th Int'l Conference on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing (WiCOM 2024) will be held during Oct. 25-27, 2024 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Wireless Communications, Networking and Mobile Computing. The aim of WiCOM 2024 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
